function solution(num) {
    let answer = 0;
    while (num != 1) {

    };
    return answer;
};

 return !(x % (x + "").split("").reduce((a, b) => +b + +a ));

function solution(x) {

function solution(s) {
    let answer = '';
    if (s.length % 2 == 0) {
        const a = s.length / 2;
        const b = a - 1;
        answer += s[b];
        answer += s[a];  
    } else {
        answer += s[parseInt(s.length / 2)];
    }
    return answer;
}
